games.title: World of Warcraft: Legion
games.alt: World of Warcraft began in the either 2000's, now almost 20 years and 7 expansions later, they still have a booming player base.

games.title: World of Warcraft: Battle Pets
games.alt: In the Mists of Pandaria Exapansion, WoW introduced Battle Bets. Explore Azeroth while battling and collecting more!

games.title: World of Warcraft: Warlock
games.alt: You'll defeat hundreds of beasts, best many foes and make many friends.

games.title: World of Warcraft: Character Creation
games.alt: With 13 different races, 2 factions and 12 classes, it's easy to create a character you'll love.

games.title: World of Warcraft: Game Play
games.alt: WoW boasts extensive UI functionality allowing for addons and complete customization of their UI despite that their default offers many benefits.
